typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_object',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_object.parquet']) ~> preDimObject
preDimObject derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Objects') ~> derivedTopLevel
derivedTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(top_key))) ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimObject
